column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Would n't I be cold wearing this outfit in the snow ? "
#Text=Varrick says : " Ah , Nuktuk is never cold . "
#Text=Bolin says : " Ohhh .
#Text=It 's the latest product in my Varri - manageable Hair Line : Varri - dye !
#Text=We get some shots of her using it before Unalaq kidnaps her , I guarantee we sell a million cases week one .
#Text=" Korra says : " Bolin , I need you to watch Naga while I 'm gone .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Where are you going ?
#Text=" Korra says : " The Fire Nation .
#Text=I 'm going to try to get them to help the South .
#Text=I need a boat .
#Text=" Varrick says : " What happened with General Iroh ?
#Text=" Korra says : " He was going to help , but then President Raiko showed up .
#Text=Someone must have tipped him off , but I ca n't figure it out .
#Text=No one knew about it except for us and Asami .
#Text=" Bolin says : " And Mako .
#Text=" Korra says : " Mako ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " What ?
#Text=There 's no way Mako would have told .
#Text=Right ?
#Text="
